title: Add “Criminal defense” option to Contact Us service selector

requirements.summary: Add “Criminal defense” as a selectable option in the Contact page consultation form service selector accordion.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Contact page, opening the “Service You Are Booking For” selector shows an option labeled exactly “Criminal defense”.
Selecting “Criminal defense” closes the accordion and populates the selected value in the service field.
Form validation continues to treat the service as selected when “Criminal defense” is chosen (i.e., no “Please select a service” error is shown after selection).

file_operations.description: Add the new service label “Criminal defense” to the predefined SERVICES list used by the accordion dropdown so it appears as a selectable option and behaves consistently with existing selections (closes on select and updates the value).
